item.title: Alignment and Uniformity
item.description: A good representation should be able to separate different instances, and cluster similar instances. Wang et al proposed two concepts that matches the above two ideas, alignment and uniformity, on a hypersphere1. From Wang et al Wang T, Isola P. Understanding Contrastive Representation Learning through Alignment and Uniformity on the Hypersphere. arXiv [cs.LG]. 2020. Available: http://arxiv.org/abs/2005.10242 ↩︎
